languages.text: {n}Сквозь марево боли и пелену выступивших на глазах слез вы ощущаете опаляющий взгляд космодесантника Хаоса, повернувшего голову в вашу сторону.{/n} "Время слов подошло к концу, дети {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}. Восславьте Богов кровавой жертвой!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Сквозь марево боли и пелену выступивших на глазах слез вы ощущаете опаляющий взгляд Хаос-десантника, повернувшего голову в вашу сторону.{/n} "Время слов подошло к концу, дети Хаоса. Восславьте Богов кровавой жертвой!"

languages.text: {n}Through the haze of pain and the film of tears over your eyes, you sense the scorching gaze of the Chaos Space Marine, who has turned his head in your direction.{/n} "The time for words is at an end, children of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Praise the Gods with a bloody offering!"
languages.original_text: {n}Сквозь марево боли и пелену выступивших на глазах слез вы ощущаете опаляющий взгляд космодесантника Хаоса, повернувшего голову в вашу сторону.{/n} "Время слов подошло к концу, дети {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаоса{/g}. Восславьте Богов кровавой жертвой!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Through the haze of pain and the film of tears over your eyes, you sense the scorching gaze of the Chaos Marine, who has turned his head in your direction.{/n} "The time for words is at an end, children of Chaos. Praise the Gods with a bloody offering!"

{n}Through the haze of pain and the film of tears over your eyes, you sense the scorching gaze of the Chaos Space Marine, who has turned his head in your direction.{/n} "The time for words is at an end, children of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Praise the Gods with a bloody offering!"

{n}Through the haze of pain and the film of tears over your eyes, you sense the scorching gaze of the Chaos Space Marine, who has turned his head in your direction.{/n} "The time for words is at an end, children of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Praise the Gods with a bloody offering!"

languages.text: {n}透过痛苦的迷雾与眼角的泪水，你感觉到了混沌星际战士炽烈的目光。他已经把头转向了你的方向。{/n}“布道的时间结束了，{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}的孩子们。献上血腥的祭品，赞美诸神吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Through the haze of pain and the film of tears over your eyes, you sense the scorching gaze of the Chaos Space Marine, who has turned his head in your direction.{/n} "The time for words is at an end, children of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Praise the Gods with a bloody offering!"

traits.locale_text: {n}透过痛苦的迷雾与眼角的泪水，你感觉到了混沌星际战士炽烈的目光。他已经把头转向了你的方向。{/n}“布道的时间结束了，{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}的孩子们。献上血腥的祭品，赞美诸神吧！”

languages.text: {n}Sientes la mirada perforadora del Marine Espacial del Caos, que se ha girado en tu dirección, aun a través de la niebla de dolor y la cortina de lágrimas que cubren tus ojos.{/n}«El momento de las palabras está llegando a su fin, hijos del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g}. ¡Alabad a los Dioses con una ofrenda de sangre!».
languages.original_text: {n}Through the haze of pain and the film of tears over your eyes, you sense the scorching gaze of the Chaos Space Marine, who has turned his head in your direction.{/n} "The time for words is at an end, children of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Praise the Gods with a bloody offering!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sientes la mirada perforadora del Marine Espacial del Caos, que se ha girado en tu dirección, aun a través de la niebla de dolor y la cortina de lágrimas que cubren tus ojos.{/n}«El momento de las palabras está llegando a su fin, hijos del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g}. ¡Alabad a los Dioses con una ofrenda de sangre!».

languages.text: {n}痛みでぼんやりする思考と、瞳にかかった涙の膜越しに、こちらを向いたケイオス・スペースマリーンの強烈な視線を感じた。{/n}「言葉遊びはそろそろ終わりだ、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}の子らよ。血にまみれた捧げ物で、神を讃えよ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Through the haze of pain and the film of tears over your eyes, you sense the scorching gaze of the Chaos Space Marine, who has turned his head in your direction.{/n} "The time for words is at an end, children of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Praise the Gods with a bloody offering!"

traits.locale_text: {n}痛みでぼんやりする思考と、瞳にかかった涙の膜越しに、こちらを向いたケイオス・スペースマリーンの強烈な視線を感じた。{/n}「言葉遊びはそろそろ終わりだ、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}の子らよ。血にまみれた捧げ物で、神を讃えよ！」

languages.text: {n}Durch den Schleier des Schmerzes und den Tränenfilm auf deinen Augen spürst du den brennenden Blick des Chaos Space Marine, der seinen Kopf in deine Richtung gewendet hat.{/n} "Die Zeit der Worte ist zu Ende, Kinder des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Preist die Götter mit einem blutigen Opfer!"
languages.original_text: {n}Through the haze of pain and the film of tears over your eyes, you sense the scorching gaze of the Chaos Space Marine, who has turned his head in your direction.{/n} "The time for words is at an end, children of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Praise the Gods with a bloody offering!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Durch den Schleier des Schmerzes und den Tränenfilm auf deinen Augen spürst du den brennenden Blick des Chaos Space Marine, der seinen Kopf in deine Richtung gewendet hat.{/n} "Die Zeit der Worte ist zu Ende, Kinder des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Preist die Götter mit einem blutigen Opfer!"

languages.text: {n}Malgré la brume de douleur et le voile de larmes qui brouillent votre vue, vous sentez le regard brûlant du Space Marine du Chaos se poser sur vous.{/n} « Le temps des discours est révolu, enfants du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Rendez grâce aux dieux par une offrande sanglante ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Through the haze of pain and the film of tears over your eyes, you sense the scorching gaze of the Chaos Space Marine, who has turned his head in your direction.{/n} "The time for words is at an end, children of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Praise the Gods with a bloody offering!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré la brume de douleur et le voile de larmes qui brouillent votre vue, vous sentez le regard brûlant du Space Marine du Chaos se poser sur vous.{/n} « Le temps des discours est révolu, enfants du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Rendez grâce aux dieux par une offrande sanglante ! »

languages.text: {n}Acı dalgası ile gözlerini bulandıran gözyaşı tabakası arasından başını sana doğru çeviren Kaosçu Uzay Piyadesi'nin kavurucu bakışlarını hissediyorsun.{/n} "Ey {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos'un{/g} çocukları, kelimelerle işimiz bitti. Tanrılara kanlı bir adakla şükredin!"
languages.original_text: {n}Through the haze of pain and the film of tears over your eyes, you sense the scorching gaze of the Chaos Space Marine, who has turned his head in your direction.{/n} "The time for words is at an end, children of {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Praise the Gods with a bloody offering!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Acı dalgası ile gözlerini bulandıran gözyaşı tabakası arasından başını sana doğru çeviren Kaosçu Uzay Piyadesi'nin kavurucu bakışlarını hissediyorsun.{/n} "Ey {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g}'un çocukları, kelimelerle işimiz bitti. Tanrılara kanlı bir adakla şükredin!"
